name: Princess Girls - Royal Closet
description:
Select your beauty queen from different princess and dress her up with amazing range of variety of princess’s outfit which you can change including hair, flowers, top outfit, crown, skirt, necklace, dress, earrings, and shoes.

Mix and match different outfits and create your own unique style with these girl games. Simply click on one of the features to apply it to the princess look by scrolling through the different variations of outfits and decorations.

Highly addictive game will offer you to become the most stylish fashion expert in this Princess Girls Royal Closet game. Meet all the other amazing princesses along with Alexandra and try out the best dresses in our princess game! Wonderful collection of outfits and great dress up game will cheer you up! Find out the surprising dresses which this world has ever seen and become the dress up expert for the princess girls.

Princess Girls - Royal Closet game Features:
- Different gorgeous princesses
- Multiple princess dress up levels
- Awesome hair of different colors and styles
- Wonderful jewelry with countless dress up combinations
- Stunning graphics and flawless gameplay
- Completely free to play and no internet required

Meet the royal girl friends of Alexandra and don't miss out on the fun at the castle with princess closet dress up game! Try one of the most fabulous princess games with makeup, hair and dress up. Dress up the princess in really classic way and make her the beauty queen.
